duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform firmware updates on syringe infusion pumps in hospital environments.
Detailed documentation of activities and completion.
Execute updates in compliance with manufacturer provided training.
Maintain security and administrative control for services and systems.
Test and update per provided instruction set.
Review manufacturers’ specifications on connections and methods to locate problems.
Update progress using provided application as required.
Perform other related duties as assigned.
Travel throughout Milwaukee and surrounding areas for work.

education_certification.credential: Associates Degree or equivalent experience, with 3-7+ years of related technical experience.
